descriptions.400: *Your words fall flat. The request you've made is incomprehensible to those around you. Perhaps rephrasing would help.*
descriptions.401: *The guard blocks your path. You lack the proper credentials to pass through these gates. Show your papers.*
descriptions.402: *The merchant eyes you suspiciously. Your coin purse is insufficient for this transaction. Find more gold.*
descriptions.403: *An invisible force repels you. This area is forbidden to all but those with special permission.*
descriptions.404: *The path before you crumbles into darkness. You've ventured into territory unmapped by any cartographer.*
descriptions.405: *That action won't work here. Choose a different approach from your repertoire of skills.*
descriptions.406: *The magic fizzles. This spell and your current situation are fundamentally incompatible.*
descriptions.408: *Time slips through your fingers like sand. The window of opportunity has closed before you could act.*
descriptions.409: *Your party members argue amongst themselves. This conflict must be resolved before you can proceed.*
descriptions.410: *The artifact crumbles to dust in your hands. What you seek has been destroyed beyond any hope of recovery.*
descriptions.413: *You collapse under the weight of your burden. You're carrying far too much. Drop some items.*
descriptions.429: *Your limbs grow heavy with exhaustion. You've pushed yourself too hard. Rest before continuing.*
descriptions.500: *Dark magic corrupts the realm. Something has gone terribly wrong with the Weave itself.*
descriptions.502: *The bridge between worlds has collapsed. You cannot cross until it is rebuilt by master craftsmen.*
descriptions.503: *The tavern doors are locked. The establishment is closed for the evening. Return at dawn.*
descriptions.504: *The portal shimmers and fades before you can step through. The connection was severed too soon.*
descriptions.default: *The path before you crumbles into darkness. You've ventured into territory unmapped by any cartographer.*

footers.404: The dice are not in your favor today
footers.503: Return when the hour is right
footers.default: The dice are not in your favor today
